Clean out the fridge Veggie Lo Mein Recipe with Soba Wheat Noodles. Use any noodles of choice. Vegan Nut-free Recipe. Easily made gluten-free with buckwheat or other gf noodles. 

#vegan #veganism #easyveganrecipes #veganrecipes #veganricha #cooking

Creative Commons ‚Äî Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported‚Äî CC BY-SA 3.0

recipeIngredient: 6 to 8 oz vegan soba noodles  (or Brown rice Pad thai noodles or other similar noodles or pasta)
3 tbsp soy sauce (use certified gf if needed)
2 to 3 cups of veggies  (like sliced bell pepper, mushrooms, broccoli, snow peas, julienned carrots, chopped spinach or chard etc.)
salt, black pepper, red pepper flakes to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the noodles according to instructions. Bring a pot of water to a boil. Add the noodles and cook for the time mentioned on the package.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the noodles according to instructions. Bring a pot of water to a boil. Add the noodles and cook for the time mentioned on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl combine the soy sauce, sesame oil, sugar and ginger. Mix well and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl combine the soy sauce, sesame oil, sugar and ginger. Mix well and set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onions, garlic, chile, bell peppers and mushrooms and cook for 4 minutes. Stir occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add onions, garlic, chile, bell peppers and mushrooms and cook for 4 minutes. Stir occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the broccoli and other veggies if using and a dash of salt and black pepper and cook for another 3 to 4 minutes or until mushrooms are golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the broccoli and other veggies if using and a dash of salt and black pepper and cook for another 3 to 4 minutes or until mushrooms are golden brown.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sauce, cooked noodles to the skillet and mix in. Adjust heat if needed. I usually add a sprinkle of pepper flakes or sriracha and a good dash of freshly ground black pepper. Serve.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the sauce, cooked noodles to the skillet and mix in. Adjust heat if needed. I usually add a sprinkle of pepper flakes or sriracha and a good dash of freshly ground black pepper. Serve.
